alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 12:45AM CDT until June 29 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Jackson County in west central Wisconsin... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 1244 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Whitehall, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. Very frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Black River Falls around 130 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Hixton, The Black River Falls Airport, Taylor, York, Castle Mound, Vaudreuil and Perry Creek Recreation Area. This includes Interstate 94 between mile markers 94 and 119. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
